info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 8:04PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Freezing drizzle to continue for the Helena Valley through midnight, with light snow over the mountain passes... Freezing drizzle continues over the Helena Valley this evening, while light snow and or mixed precipitation fall over the mountain passes. Light ice accumulations in the Helena area have caused a light glaze to develop over roads, sidewalks, and other exposed surfaces. Travelers and pedestrians should be prepared to use caution on the icy surfaces. Also note that light snow and or mixed precipitation is falling over the mountain passes outside of Helena, which may reduce visibility and cause those roadways to become slippery as well.
